Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that shows how people communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate the device using only the materials that might be typically available, like cups and string.
The student can show the telephone using sound to communicate information between two people.
The student can label specific parts of the drawing that are important for sending and receiving sound.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing how the string carries sound waves from one student to the other.
The student can depict the students communicating with the telephone to show how this technology helps people communicate over distances.
